titleStmt.title: The heire an excellent comedie. As it was lately acted by the Company of the Reuels. / Writren [sic] by T.M. Gent..
titleStmt.author: May, Thomas, 1595-1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B[ernard] A[lsop] for Thomas Iones, and are to bee sold at his shop in Chancery-lane, ouer-against the Roles, and in Westminster Hall.,

notesStmt.note: By Thomas May, whose name appears on A3r.
Running title reads: An excellent comedy called the heire.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproductions of the originals in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (reel 966:5) and Folger Shakespeare Library (reel 2365:2).

place.placeName: his shop in Chancery-lane, ouer-against the Roles
